remarks.format:
## 解説 The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.CorrelationScope> activity maintains an implicit <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.CorrelationHandle> that is only visible to child activities. When the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.CorrelationScope.CorrelatesWith%2A> property is set by the user, it will be used as the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.CorrelationScope> implicit handle. In the case of nested <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.CorrelationScope>, children of the inner scope cannot access implicit handle of the outer scope.
## 例 The following example shows how to create a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.CorrelationScope>. This example creates a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.Sequence> and adds a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.CorrelationScope> \(among other activites\). The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.CorrelationScope> contains a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.Sequence> that is composed of a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.Send> and <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.ReceiveReply> activity.
